Package ru.nsu.pisarev

Interface Expression

All Known Implementing Classes:
Add, Div, Mul, Number, Sub, Variable
public interface Expression
Expression allows manipulations (creation, derivative, simplification and printing) with arithmetic expressions. Descendants of this class are Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Number constant and Variable. Programmers can create their own descendants of this interface. Subclasses must throw ArithmeticException when expression evaluation error occurs. Subclasses must implement toString method to write expression in a line as part of bigger expression,
